ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope you re right.  Dex does nothing for speed.  All dex does is: 1)  Affects dmg for bows 2)  Affects dmg for thrown  (not told but determined through
ygData.messageBody:
Nope you're right. Dex does nothing for speed. All dex does is:

1) Affects dmg for bows
2) Affects dmg for thrown (not told but determined through experience)
3) Affects chance of crits/cripple
4) Increases chance of a weapon processing it's effect
5) Decreases song missed note rate
6) Helps casters recover from interruption

Thats it

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 12:30 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations

> haste items and spells/songs. dex will increase your procs if you add
some
